```{r cars}
a <- 2
b <- -3
n <- 75
sig_sq <- 0.005
x <- runif(n)
y <- a + b * x + rnorm(n, sd = sqrt(sig_sq))
(avg_x <- mean(x))
write(avg_x, "avg_x.txt")
plot(x,y)
abline(a,b, col = "purple")
```
